Statute.Title: Atlantic Fisheries Restructuring Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Restructuration du secteur des pêches de l’Atlantique, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Fisheries and Oceans; Minister of Industry under subsection 6(1) with respect to certain companies (SOR/84‑764); Minister of State (Privatization and Regulatory Affairs) in respect of certain companies (SOR/87‑91); Minister of Finance in respect of National Sea Products Limited (SOR/89‑187)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 3, par. 172(b) (terminology) in force on assent 26.02.2015.
